Today, Cornwall is experiencing poor conditions with fresh onshore winds at 35 mph, creating a blown-out situation across the coast. Tomorrow sees a slight improvement with 8 ft @ 11s WSW swell and moderate SW winds at 18 mph, making it workable at spots like Crantock and Porthcurno. The day after, conditions drop again to 6 ft @ 11s with similar wind, keeping it on the poor side. Best: tomorrow.
